name: MixCast Studio
detailed_description:
MixCast 1.5 & MixCast Capture

MixCast Studio 1.5 includes MixCast Capture - a new way to make mixed reality content from a huge library of VR titles! (MixCast SDK not required!). Simply set up mixed reality in Studio, switch to MixCast Capture, and then launch your desired VR title! Learn more with our MixCast Capture Setup Guide.

MixCast Capture can be used with most Unity-based SteamVR titles including:

  • Accounting
  • Arizona Sunshine
  • Audioshield
  • Blocks by Google
  • Climbey
  • Cosmic Trip
  • Cowbots and Aliens
  • Fruit Ninja VR
  • Jeeboman
  • Rec Room
  • Richie's Plank Experience
  • Sairento VR
  • Smashbox Arena
  • Soundstage
  • Tilt Brush


About the Software

Are you interested in easy and simple mixed reality streaming and broadcasting? MixCast can give you this ability quickly and easily!

Learn more at https://mixcast.me!

MixCast Studio provides a guided user experience for setup and configuration of the camera parameters using a headset and hand controllers for placement. Users can immediately view the output of their mixed reality setup from within the application to confirm their settings.

Once calibrated, MixCast Studio communicates with any application with the MixCast SDK integration to enable live mixed reality streaming and recording without any additional work from the user. This is highly convenient for streamers, podcasters, and others who wish to broadcast or share content from multiple supported VR titles. Learn more with the MixCast Studio Setup Guide

MixCast Studio 1.5 includes MixCast Capture - a new way to make mixed reality content from a huge library of VR titles! (MixCast SDK not required!). Simply set up mixed reality in Studio, switch to MixCast Capture, and then launch your desired VR title! Learn more with our MixCast Capture Setup Guide.

The MixCast System for VR is composed of MixCast Studio, MixCast SDK and now, MixCast Capture. Together, they provide a solution for calibration and inline, in-engine, mixed reality compositing of VR applications using a green screen and a basic webcam.

For developers, the MixCast SDK will be offered for free!. Integration is designed to be as painless and straightforward as possible. After setup, results can be tested immediately with MixCast Studio.

MixCast can be used with any game or application that has integrated the MixCast SDK, including Blueprint Reality's own VR title, Awaken, Chroma Lab, and Holodance! Let your favourite VR developers know you want MixCast integrated in their titles!

MixCast Capture can be used with most Unity-based SteamVR titles including:
  • Accounting
  • Arizona Sunshine
  • Audioshield
  • Blocks by Google
  • Climbey
  • Cosmic Trip
  • Cowbots and Aliens
  • Fruit Ninja VR
  • Jeeboman
  • Rec Room
  • Richie's Plank Experience
  • Sairento VR
  • Smashbox Arena
  • Soundstage
  • Tilt Brush

For more information please visit https://mixcast.me!

short_description: Are you interested in easy and simple mixed reality streaming and broadcasting? MixCast Studio can give you this capability.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Korean*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 960 or greater
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Webcam or other video input device required
